markdownRemark.html: Postgraduate of Polish philology and Psychology in management. These two slightly different directions allowed her to acquire skills suitable for working with (and for) people. As an Office & HR Assistant she’s providing administrative and HR support and helps to run an office. Ask her anything and she’ll do her best to help you! :) Plants, vintage style and Moomin books lover. Long walks in nature with her dog is her way to relax.
